user.title: Set up Sequence
user.description: Enter your Sequence API access token to connect your account.

data_description.access_token: Your Sequence API access token from the developer dashboard

reauth_confirm.title: Reauthenticate Sequence
reauth_confirm.description: Please enter your Sequence API access token to reauthenticate.

data_description.access_token: Your updated Sequence API access token

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to Sequence API. Please check your internet connection and try again.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid access token. Please check your token and try again.
error.unknown: Unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

init.title: Configure Account Types
init.description: Select which external accounts should be categorized as liabilities or investments. Found {account_count} external accounts. Select 'None' if you have no accounts of that type.

data_description.liability_accounts: Select accounts that represent liabilities (debts, loans, credit cards). Choose 'None' if you have no liabilities.
data_description.investment_accounts: Select accounts that represent investments (brokerage, retirement, savings). Choose 'None' if you have no investments.
